p: When it comes to sub-dimensions, it is not surprising that financial topics are the trendiest (5 out of 6 SDGs). Economic and entrepreneurship relevance is always associated with financial subjects (2 cases both) and the issues appear in the same SDGs. The same role is attributed to agricultural problems (2 cases in total). The latter is coupled with either a financial or legal sub-dimension (1 unit each). Legal issues are only covered in 1 SDG.
